main event: A series of unidentified aerial phenomena were reported over Savona, Italy, between July and November 1964.
interesting points: Witnesses reported seeing luminous objects traveling at incredible speeds and changing direction with precision., The sightings included various shapes such as spherical and lens-like objects., On 22 September 1964, a large silvery object hovered above the city for several hours., Some objects appeared to discharge formations resembling cotton that dissolved upon contact., Areas around sightings were found to have high radiation levels later in November 1964.
